Metaphor:EVENTS ARE OBJECTS

From EN MetaNet Wiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Name Gloss EVENTS ARE OBJECTS
Name Transcription
Aliases

AN EVENT IS THE MOTION OF AN OBJECT (Grady (1998))

EVENTS ARE MOVING OBJECTS

Description
Comments This is specifically about moving objects. We may want to distinguish. (oana)
Tags
Family Object Event Structure Metaphor, Grady Primary Metaphors, Ontological Metaphors
Metaphor Level General
Metaphor Type Primary
Experiential Basis
Cultural Scope
Source Frame Object
Roles:object_entity, size, shape, substance, weight, object_interior, object_exterior_surface
